TEXT.TITLE: HOUSE TRADE BILL DRAFTING POSTPONED
TEXT.BODY: The House Ways and Means trade subcommittee postponed until next week its opening session to start drafting major changes to U.S. trade laws, a committee aide said. The subcommittee had not yet completed the preparatory work to start writing the legislation, the aide said. Reuter
